Aux:TextAnnotations.Aux:document_text: Work Order Amendment to Agreement for CollegeForTN This Work Order Amendment (the “Amendment”) to that certain Agreement dated July 1,2006 (the “Agreement”) by and between the Tennessee Board of Regents (“TBR”) on behalf of it’s member institution Volunteer State Community College and XAP Corporation (“XAP”) is made and entered into this day of iUatoIa 200.37 TBR and XAP hereby amend the Agreement as follows, with capitalized terms defined in the Agreement but not defined in this Amendment having the meaning assigned to them, respectively, in the Agreement: Customer Name TBR: Volunteer State Community College Project Name Seamless Pass-through Branded Login & Account Creation Screens Projected Delivery Date 10 Business days Statement of Work XAP will develop and maintain a branded login screen and branded account creation screens with the Institution’s logo (collectively, the “Screens”) for use in linking from the Institution’s website to the Institution’s online application on the System. Term The initial term of this Amendment shall commence upon the execution of this Amendment by TBR and XAP and shall continue for as long as the Agreement is in effect. Price TBR: Volunteer State Community College shall pay to Xap the price of the design and development of the Project as hereinafter set forth. The price established for the design and development of the Project is One Thousand Dollars ($1000.00). No additional fees of operation and maintenance of the Project have been established. The payments for the design and development of the Project shall be made by TBR: Volunteer State Community College to XAP in accordance with the schedule set forth below in the Payment Schedule. Payment Schedule Xap shall invoice TBR: Volunteer State Community College for the Project. Payment shall be due within thirty (30) days from the date of XAP s invoice. Each payment shall be accompanied by an accounting setting forth the data upon which the payment is based. Xap Corporation • 3534 Hayden Avenue • Culver City, CA 90232 (310) 842-9800 • FAX (310) 842-9898 http://www.xap.com The Restated Agreement, as amended and modified by this Amendment, is hereby ratified and confirmed as of the date first above written. The remaining terms of the Agreement are unchanged by this Amendment. TBR: VOLUNTEER STATE COMMUNITY Name : Be Th CcoKse^ XAP CORPORATION Name: Charles A.
